feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
